story.book

Interface StoryController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalStoryController, OnlineStoryController

    public interface StoryController
    StoryController interface for getting Story objects, lists of stories and saving stories.
    Author:
    Alex

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getStory(int SID)
      Sets the current Story of the StoryApplication.
      java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryList()
      Gets an ArrayList of StoryInfo to be displayed to the user.
      void saveStory()
      Save the Application current Story to a destination.

    • Method Detail

      • getStory

        void getStory(int SID)
        Sets the current Story of the StoryApplication.
        Parameters:
        SID - the SID of the Story to set

      • getStoryList

        java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryList()
        Gets an ArrayList of StoryInfo to be displayed to the user.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of StoryInfo objects from a source

      • saveStory

        void saveStory()
        Save the Application current Story to a destination.
